title: Player-owned houses glitch

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Player-owned houses glitch was a glitch that occurred on 9 December 2020.

content:
The Player-owned houses glitch was a glitch that occurred on 9 December 2020.

After the 2020 Christmas Event update, various player-owned house furniture had disappeared for many players. This was hotfixed less than an hour after the update.[1]

The day after the glitch, Jagex did another update to fix an issue with spirit trees that was causing the tree not to be central in their superior garden when decorated.[2]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Sarnie's Twitter account. 9 December 2020. (Archived from the original on 17 December 2020.) Mod Sarnie: "We found them and they should of all gone back home now."
  2. ^ Jagex. Old School RuneScape's Twitter account. 10 December 2020. (Archived from the original on 17 December 2020.) Old School RuneScape: "The coldfix will make the Spirit Trees in your PoH stay in the centre of their respective areas when decorated."
